TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebConfigurationManager extends System.Object
public ref class WebConfigurationManager abstract sealed

summary.span: 在配置文件应用于 Web 应用程序时提供对配置文件的访问。

span.span: Provides access to configuration files as they apply to Web applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类可以访问计算机和应用程序信息。The class allows you to access computer and application information. 使用 是使用与 Web 应用程序相关的配置文件的首选方法。Using is the preferred way to work with configuration files related to Web applications. 对于客户端应用程序，请使用 类。For client applications, use the class. 应用程序可以扩展 类型，也可以直接使用它们来处理配置信息，如下面的列表中所述：Your application can extend the types or use them directly to handle configuration information, as explained in the following list: - `Handling configuration`.`Handling configuration`. 若要使用标准类型处理配置信息，请使用下列方法之一：To handle configuration information using the standard types, you use one of the following approaches: - `Accessing a section`.`Accessing a section`. 若要访问应用程序的配置信息，必须使用 `GetSection` 提供的方法之一 。To access configuration information for your application, you must use one of the `GetSection` methods provided by . 对于 `` 和 `` ，请使用 和 属性。For `` and ``, you use the and properties. 这些方法执行只读操作，使用配置的单个缓存实例，并且可以识别多线程。These methods perform read-only operations, use a single cached instance of the configuration, and are multithread aware. - `Accessing configuration files`.`Accessing configuration files`. 应用程序可以在本地或远程读取和写入任意级别的配置设置。Your application can read and write configuration settings at any level, for itself or for other applications or computers, locally or remotely. 使用由 `open` 提供的方法之一 。You use one of the `open` methods provided by . 这些方法将返回一个 对象，该对象进而提供处理基础配置文件所需的方法和属性。These methods will return a object, which in turn provides the required methods and properties to handle the underlying configuration files. 这些方法执行读取或写入操作，并在每次打开文件时重新创建配置数据。These methods perform read or write operations and recreate the configuration data every time a file is opened. - `Advanced configuration`.`Advanced configuration`. 更高级的配置处理由类型、、、、、 和提供 。More advanced configuration handling is provided by the types , , , , , , and . - `Extending configuration standard types`.`Extending configuration standard types`. 你还可以通过 使用编程或特性化模型扩展标准配置类型（如、、和）来提供自定义配置元素。You can also provide your custom configuration elements by extending the standard configuration types such as , , , and by using a programmatic or an attributed model. 有关如何以编程方式扩展标准配置类型的示例，请参阅类。Refer to the class for an example of how to extend a standard configuration type programmatically. 有关如何使用特性化模型扩展标准配置类型的示例，请参阅类。Refer to the class for an example of how to extend a standard configuration type using the attributed model. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用The following example shows how to access configuration information with the 方法。 method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#2)]

para.span: 类允许以编程方式访问配置文件。

span.span: The class allows programmatic access for editing configuration files.

para.span: 使用由提供的打开方法之一 。

span.span: You use one of the open methods provided by .

para.span: 这些方法将返回一个 对象，该对象进而提供处理基础配置文件所需的方法和属性。

span.span: These methods will return a object, which in turn provides the required methods and properties to handle the underlying configuration files.

para.span: 可以按如下所示访问这些文件以进行读取或写入：

span.span: You can access these files for reading or writing as follows:

para.span: 你使用 或 来读取配置信息。

span.span: You use or to read configuration information.

para.span: 请注意，读取的用户或进程必须具有以下权限：

span.span: Note that the user or process that reads must have the following permissions:

para.span: -对当前配置层次结构级别的配置文件的读取权限。

span.span: - Read permission on the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level.

para.span: -对所有父配置文件的读取权限。

span.span: - Read permissions on all the parent configuration files.

para.span: 如果你的应用程序需要对自己的配置进行只读访问，则建议你使用这些 方法。

span.span: If your application needs read-only access to its own configuration, it is recommended you use the methods.

para.span: 这些方法提供对当前应用程序的缓存配置值的访问，该配置值具有比类更好的性能 。

span.span: These methods provide access to the cached configuration values for the current application, which has better performance than the class.

para.span: 如果使用 采用参数的静态方法 ，则 path 参数必须引用运行代码的应用程序; 否则，将忽略该参数并返回当前正在运行的应用程序的配置信息。

span.span: If you use a static method that takes a parameter, the path parameter must refer to the application in which the code is running; otherwise, the parameter is ignored and configuration information for the currently-running application is returned.

para.span: 使用其中一种 方法来编写配置信息。

span.span: You use one of the methods to write configuration information.

para.span: 请注意，写入的用户或进程必须具有以下权限：

span.span: Note that the user or process that writes must have the following permissions:

para.span: -对当前配置层次结构级别的配置文件和目录具有写入权限。

span.span: - Write permission on the configuration file and directory at the current configuration hierarchy level.

para.span: -对所有配置文件的读取权限。

span.span: - Read permissions on all the configuration files.
ASP.NET Configuration Overview

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性访问配置信息并枚举结果。The following example shows how to use the property to access configuration information and enumerate the results. 若要访问特定的连接字符串，请使用返回的，并将所 需的连接字符串的名称用作索引器。To access a specific connection string, use the returned with the name of the desired connection string as an indexer. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#7)]

summary.span: 从当前 Web 应用程序的默认配置文件中检索指定的配置节。

span.span: Retrieves the specified configuration section from the current Web application's default configuration file.
ASP.NET Configuration Overview

Public Shared Function GetSection (sectionName As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetSection(System::String ^ sectionName);
static member GetSection : string -> obj

param.name: sectionName
param.span: 配置节名称。

span.span: The configuration section name.

summary.span: 从当前 Web 应用程序的配置文件中检索指定的配置节。

span.span: Retrieves the specified configuration section from the current Web application's configuration file.

returns.span: 指定的配置节对象或 （如果该节不存在）。

span.span: The specified configuration section object, or if the section does not exist.

returns.span: 请记住，将 用作运行时操作存在安全限制。

span.span: Remember that security restrictions exist on the use of as a runtime operation.

returns.span: 例如，您可能无法在运行时访问某节以进行修改。

span.span: You might not be able to access a section at run time for modifications, for example.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 从 web 应用程序中调用，它将从系统根据 Web 应用程序配置层次结构选择的配置文件中获取部分。If is called from within a Web application, it gets the section from the configuration file selected by the system according to the Web-application configuration hierarchy. > [!CAUTION] > 如果你的应用程序使用的协议不同于 HTTP，则在 其参数列表中采用节名称和路径的重载是要使用的协议。If your application uses a different protocol than HTTP, the overload that takes both a section name and a path in its parameter list is the one to use. 您必须指定配置文件路径，因为系统无法对配置层次结构级别作出任何假设。You must specify the configuration file path because the system cannot make any assumptions about the configuration hierarchy level. 如果使用 只采用部分名称的重载，则系统将始终尝试在应用程序级别返回配置设置。If you use the overload that takes only a section name, the system will always attempt to return the configuration settings at the application level. 但请注意，如果其指定的路径不在当前应用程序的范围内，则采用路径的重载也将返回当前正在运行的应用程序的应用程序级别的配置设置。Note, though, that if its specified path is outside of the current application, the overload that takes a path will also return the application-level configuration settings for the currently running application. 你可以 从客户端应用程序中调用。You could call from within a client application. 在这种情况下，它会根据客户端配置层次结构从系统所选的配置文件中获取默认节。In this case, it gets the default section from the configuration file selected by the system according to the client configuration hierarchy. 通常，这是 Machine.config 文件，除非已设置了映射的配置。Usually, this is the Machine.config file, unless you have a mapped configuration in place. 有关映射配置文件的详细说明，请参阅下一步所述的映射方法。For mapping configuration files, refer to the mapping methods described next. > [!NOTE] > 此 方法是一种运行时方法，可对应用程序运行时所在的层次结构级别的配置文件的部分进行操作。The method is a run-time method that operates on the section of a configuration file at the hierarchy level in which the application runs. 对于非运行时操作，请 改用。For a non-run-time operation, use instead. 此方法在配置文件的指定节上操作，该配置文件使用一种用于打开配置文件的重载方法获取 。This method operates on the specified section of a configuration file that you obtain using one of the overloaded methods for opening a configuration file, . ## Examples 本节中的示例演示如何使用方法访问配置信息 。The examples in this section show how to access configuration information with the method. 下面的示例演示了一个可从 Web 应用程序或控制台应用程序访问的部分。The following example shows a section that can be accessed from either a Web application or a console application. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用 方法 从配置文件中获取对象。This example demonstrates how to use the method to get a object from a configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#2)]

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

para.span: 在使用之前，必须将返回值强制转换为所需的配置类型。

span.span: The return value must be cast to the expected configuration type before use.

para.span: 为了避免可能的强制转换异常，应 在 c # 中使用运算符或 Visual Basic 中的函数时使用条件转换运算。

span.span: To avoid possible casting exceptions, you should use a conditional casting operation like the operator in C# or the function in Visual Basic.

span.span: Remember that security restrictions exist on the use of as a run-time operation.

returns.span: 例如，您可能无法在运行时访问某节以进行修改。

span.span: You might not be able to access a section at run time for modifications, for instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 从 Web 应用程序中调用，它将从配置层次结构中由指定路径定义的配置文件中获取部分。If is called from within a Web application, it gets the section from the configuration file defined by the specified path in the configuration hierarchy. > [!CAUTION] > 如果你的应用程序使用的协议不同于 HTTP，则在 其参数列表中采用节名称和路径的重载是要使用的协议。If your application uses a different protocol than HTTP, the overload that takes both a section name and a path in its parameter list is the one to use. 您必须指定配置文件路径，因为系统无法对配置层次结构级别作出任何假设。You must specify the configuration file path because the system cannot make any assumptions about the configuration hierarchy level. 如果使用 只采用部分名称的重载，则系统将始终尝试在应用程序级别返回配置设置。If you use the overload that takes only a section name, the system will always attempt to return the configuration settings at the application level. 但请注意，如果其指定的路径不在当前应用程序的范围内，则采用路径的重载也将返回当前正在运行的应用程序的应用程序级别的配置设置。Note, though, that if its specified path is outside of the current application, the overload that takes a path will also return the application-level configuration settings for the currently running application. 不能从客户端应用程序中调用此方法。This method cannot be called from within a client application. 如果要从位于当前 Web 应用程序目录级别的配置文件中检索配置节，请使用 方法。If you want to retrieve the configuration section from the configuration file located at the current Web application directory level, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法是在应用程序运行的层次结构级别上的配置文件部分中操作的运行时方法。The method is a run-time method operating on the section of a configuration file at the hierarchy level in which the application runs. 对于非运行时操作，请 改用。For a non-run-time operation, use instead. 此方法在使用配置文件方法之一获取的配置文件的指定节上操作 `open` 。This method operates on the specified section of a configuration file that you obtain using one of the `open` configuration file methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法访问配置信息 。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用 方法 从指定的配置文件中获取一个对象。This example demonstrates how to use the method to get a object from a specified configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#5)]

exception.span: 从 Web 应用程序外调用方法。

span.span: The method is called from outside a Web application.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

para.span: 在使用之前，必须将返回值强制转换为所需的配置类型。

span.span: The return value must be cast to the expected configuration type before use.

para.span: 为了避免可能的强制转换异常，应 在 c # 中使用运算符或 Visual Basic 中的函数时使用条件转换运算。

span.span: To avoid possible casting exceptions, you should use a conditional casting operation like the operator in C# or the function in Visual Basic.

span.span: The specified configuration section object, or if the section does not exist, or an internal object if the section is not accessible at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 从 web 应用程序中调用，它将从系统根据 Web 应用程序配置层次结构选择的配置文件中获取部分。If is called from within a Web application, it gets the section from the configuration file selected by the system according to the Web-application configuration hierarchy. 你可以 从客户端应用程序中调用。You could call from within a client application. 在这种情况下，它会根据客户端配置层次结构从系统所选的配置文件中获取默认节。In this case, it gets the default section from the configuration file selected by the system according to the client configuration hierarchy. 通常，这是 Machine.config 文件，除非已设置了映射的配置。Usually, this is the Machine.config file, unless you have a mapped configuration in place. 有关映射配置文件的详细说明，请参阅下一步所述的映射方法。For mapping configuration files, refer to the mapping methods described next. > [!NOTE] > 此 方法是一种运行时操作，用于操作位于当前级别的应用程序配置文件的部分。The method is a run-time operation that acts on the section of the application configuration file located at the current level. 但方法并不是运行时操作，而是在通过用于打开配置文件的方法之一获取的指定节上操作。The method, however, is not a run-time operation but acts on the specified section obtained through one of the methods for opening the configuration files. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法访问配置信息 。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用 方法 从默认的配置文件中获取一个对象。This example demonstrates how to use the method to get a object from the default configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#6)]

summary.span: 将当前计算机上的计算机配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the machine-configuration file on the current computer as a object to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法打开运行应用程序的计算机上的计算机配置文件。The method opens the machine-configuration file on the computer where the application runs. 此文件位于标准生成目录%windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\version\config。This file is located in the standard build directory %windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\version\config. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法访问配置信息 。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#9)]

param.name: locationSubPath
param.span: 配置应用的应用程序路径。

span.span: The application path to which the configuration applies.

param.name: server
param.span: 完全限定服务器名，将返回该服务器的配置。

summary.span: 将指定服务器上的指定计算机配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法打开计算机配置文件，该文件位于参数所指定的目录 `locationSubPath` 和参数指定的计算机上 `server` 。This method opens the machine-configuration file that is located in the directory specified by the `locationSubPath` parameter and on the computer specified by the `server` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法访问配置信息 。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#11)]

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

summary.span: 使用指定的安全上下文将指定服务器上的指定计算机配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the specified machine-configuration file on the specified server as a object, using the specified security context to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于通过模拟访问配置文件。This method is used to access a configuration file using impersonation. > [!NOTE] > 通常从类的实例 或通过调用非托管代码（如调用 WINDOWS API）来检索帐户令牌 `LogonUser` 。The account token is usually retrieved from an instance of the class or through a call to unmanaged code, such as a call to the Windows API `LogonUser`. 有关非托管代码调用的详细信息，请参阅 [使用非托管 DLL 函数](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions)。For more information about calls to unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法访问配置信息 。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#12)]

exception.span: 没有为 或 参数提供有效值。

span.span: Valid values were not supplied for the or parameters.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

related.span: 使用非托管 DLL 函数

span.span: Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions

summary.span: 使用指定的文件映射将 Web 应用程序配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the Web-application configuration file as a object using the specified file mapping to allow read or write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要将虚拟目录层次结构映射到物理目录时，请使用映射机制。You use the mapping mechanism when you need to map your virtual directory hierarchy to a physical directory. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将虚拟目录层次结构映射到物理目录层次结构。The following example shows how to map a virtual directory hierarchy to a physical one. 此处显示的示例用于重载成员。The example shown here is used in the overloaded members. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Configuration.Configuration OpenMappedWebConfiguration (System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationFileMap fileMap, string path);

Public Shared Function OpenMappedWebConfiguration (fileMap As WebConfigurationFileMap, path As String) As Configuration
public: static System::Configuration::Configuration ^ OpenMappedWebConfiguration(System::Web::Configuration::WebConfigurationFileMap ^ fileMap, System::String ^ path);
static member OpenMappedWebConfiguration : System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationFileMap * string -> System.Configuration.Configuration

param.name: fileMap
param.span: 用于替换默认 Web 应用程序配置文件的 对象。

span.span: The object to use in place of a default Web-application configuration file.

param.name: path
param.span: 配置文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to the configuration file.

summary.span: 使用指定的文件映射和虚拟路径将指定的 Web 应用程序配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the specified Web-application configuration file as a object using the specified file mapping and virtual path to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取 资源的对象，你的代码必须对它继承其设置的所有配置文件具有读取权限。To obtain the object for a resource, your code must have read privileges on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings. 若要更新配置文件，你的代码还必须对配置文件及其所在的目录具有写入权限。To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write privileges for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#21)] 前面的示例使用以下自定义方法生成 对象。The preceding example uses the following custom method to generate a object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#20)] 有关演示如何将虚拟目录层次结构映射到物理目录层次结构的示例，请参阅。Refer to for an example that shows how to map a virtual directory hierarchy to a physical one.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

param.name: path
param.span: 配置文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to the configuration file.

param.name: site
param.span: 显示在 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 配置中的应用程序网站的名称。

span.span: The name of the application Web site, as displayed in Internet Information Services (IIS) configuration.

param.name: locationSubPath
param.span: 配置应用的特定资源。

summary.span: 使用指定的虚拟路径、站点名称、位置和服务器将 Web 应用程序配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the Web-application configuration file as a object using the specified virtual path, site name, location, and server to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取 远程资源的对象，你的代码必须具有远程计算机上的管理权限。To obtain the object for a remote resource, your code must have administrative privileges on the remote computer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法访问配置信息 。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#17)]

exception.span: 服务器参数无效。

span.span: The server parameter was invalid.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

summary.span: 使用指定的虚拟路径、站点名称、位置、服务器和安全上下文将 Web 应用程序配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the Web-application configuration file as a object using the specified virtual path, site name, location, server, and security context to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于通过模拟访问配置文件。This method is used to access a configuration file using impersonation. > [!NOTE] > 通常从类的实例 或通过调用非托管代码（如调用 WINDOWS API）来检索帐户令牌 `LogonUser` 。The account token is usually retrieved from an instance of the class or through a call to unmanaged code, such as a call to the Windows API `LogonUser`. 有关非托管代码调用的详细信息，请参阅 [使用非托管 DLL 函数](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions)。For more information about calls to unmanaged code, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](/dotnet/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions). 若要获取 远程资源的对象，你的代码必须具有远程计算机上的管理权限。To obtain the object for a remote resource, your code must have administrative privileges on the remote computer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法来访问配置信息。The following example shows how to use the method to access configuration information. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#19)]

exception.span: 或 参数无效。

span.span: The or parameters were invalid.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: A valid configuration file could not be loaded.

related.span: 使用非托管 DLL 函数

span.span: Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions

Public Shared Function OpenWebConfiguration (path As String, site As String, locationSubPath As String, server As String, userName As String, password As String) As Configuration

public: static System::Configuration::Configuration ^ OpenWebConfiguration(System::String ^ path, System::String ^ site, System::String ^ locationSubPath, System::String ^ server, System::String ^ userName, System::String ^ password);
static member OpenWebConfiguration : string * string * string * string * string * string -> System.Configuration.Configuration

param.name: path
param.span: 配置文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to the configuration file.

param.name: site
param.span: 显示在 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 配置中的应用程序网站的名称。

span.span: The name of the application Web site, as displayed in Internet Information Services (IIS) configuration.

param.name: locationSubPath
param.span: 配置应用的特定资源。

span.span: The specific resource to which the configuration applies.

param.name: server
param.span: Web 应用程序所在的服务器的网络名称。

span.span: The network name of the server the Web application resides on.

param.name: userName
param.span: 打开文件时要使用的用户全名 (Domain\User)。

span.span: The full user name (Domain\User) to use when opening the file.

param.name: password
param.span: 用户名的密码。

span.span: The password for the user name.

summary.span: 使用指定的虚拟路径、站点名称、位置、服务器和安全上下文将 Web 应用程序配置文件作为 对象打开以允许读或写操作。

span.span: Opens the Web-application configuration file as a object using the specified virtual path, site name, location, server, and security context to allow read or write operations.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于通过模拟访问配置文件。This method is used to access a configuration file using impersonation. 若要获取 远程资源的对象，你的代码必须具有远程计算机上的管理权限。To obtain the object for a remote resource, your code must have administrative privileges on the remote computer. 你可能需要运行 [ASP.NET IIS 注册工具 ( # A0) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/k6h9cz8h(v=vs.90)) ，其中包含 `-config+` 用于启用对远程计算机上的配置文件的访问的选项。You might need to run the [ASP.NET IIS Registration Tool (Aspnet_regiis.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/k6h9cz8h(v=vs.90)) with the `-config+` option to enable access to the configuration files on the remote computer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法访问配置信息 。The following example shows how to access configuration information with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/CS/WebConfigurationManager.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager/VB/WebConfigurationManager.vb#18)]

exception.span: 或 和 参数无效。

span.span: The or and parameters were invalid.

exception.span: 未能加载有效的配置文件。

span.span: Could not load a valid configuration file.

related.span: ASP.NET IIS 注册工具 ( # A0)

span.span: ASP.NET IIS Registration Tool (Aspnet_regiis.exe)
